default.title: Something very very bad has happened
default.message: Our error handler could not handle the error that occured. That's how you know it's serious. Don't worry, 5000 emails have been sent to the development team.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You are not authorized to access this resource. Please login and try again.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You do not have permission to access this resource. If you believe this is an error, contact the development team.

404.title: Nothing to see here
404.message: Page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL. If you think this is an error, contact the development team.

406.title: Not Acceptable
406.message: The server cannot generate a response acceptable to your request. Please adjust your request and try again.

408.title: Request Timeout
408.message: The server timed out waiting for your request. Please try again later.

410.title: Gone
410.message: The resource you are trying to access has been permanently removed. If you believe this is an error, contact the development team.

418.title: I'm a teapot
418.message: This server is a teapot, not a coffee maker. Please find a coffee-capable server.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You have sent too many requests in a short time. Please slow down and try again later.

500.title: Something bad has happened
500.message: API service could not handle your request. Try refreshing the page.

503.title: Service unavailable
503.message: API service is either not responding or unreachable. Please ensure a proper connection to the API service.
